description: Update a project transport plan segment
permissions: Requires access to the related project transport plan via ProjectTransportPlanSegmentPolicy (delegated to ProjectTransportPlanPolicy).
side_effects: Updates a project transport plan segment. If the destination changes, the server refreshes inbound office caches for drivers; saves may also update transport route and miles based on closest matches.
validation_notes: Segment ID argument is required. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided. project-transport-plan, origin, and destination relationships are create-only and cannot be updated. miles must be a non-negative number when provided. miles_source must be one of unknown or transport_route when set. project-transport-plan-segment-set must belong to the same plan. trucker must match the segment set trucker and belong to the same broker as the plan. external-tms-order-number and external-tms-movement-number can only be set when the project is transport-only.

flags.name: --external-tms-order-number
flags.validation: Only allowed when the project is transport-only.

flags.name: --external-tms-movement-number
flags.validation: Only allowed when the project is transport-only.
